alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lee County through 430 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Walnut, or 9 miles southwest of Amboy, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amboy, Harmon and Eldena. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 45 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
